Name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Credit: Dir: Sergio Leone With: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef
Outline: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Name: Once Upon a Time in the West
Credit: Dir: Sergio Leone With: Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson, Claudia Cardinale
Outline: Epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Name: Django Unchained
Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio
Outline: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

Name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
Credit: Dir: John Huston With: Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt
Outline: Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

Name: For a Few Dollars More
Credit: Dir: Sergio Leone With: Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria VolontÃ¨
Outline: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

Name: Unforgiven
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman
Outline: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

Name: The Revenant
Credit: Dir: Alejandro G. IÃ±Ã¡rritu With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Will Poulter
Outline: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
Credit: Dir: George Roy Hill With: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross
Outline: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

Name: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
Credit: Dir: John Ford With: James Stewart, John Wayne, Vera Miles
Outline: A senator, who became famous for killing a notorious outlaw, returns for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.

Name: High Noon
Credit: Dir: Fred Zinnemann With: Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Thomas Mitchell
Outline: A marshall, personally compelled to face a returning deadly enemy, finds that his own town refuses to help him.

Name: Rio Bravo
Credit: Dir: Howard Hawks With: John Wayne, Dean Martin, Ricky Nelson
Outline: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Name: A Fistful of Dollars
Credit: Dir: Sergio Leone With: Clint Eastwood, Gian Maria VolontÃ¨, Marianne Koch
Outline: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

Name: The Wild Bunch
Credit: Dir: Sam Peckinpah With: William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan
Outline: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

Name: Dances with Wolves
Credit: Dir: Kevin Costner With: Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene
Outline: Lt. John Dunbar, exiled to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

Name: The Searchers
Credit: Dir: John Ford With: John Wayne, Jeffrey Hunter, Vera Miles
Outline: A Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from an Indian tribe.

Name: The Hateful Eight
Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh
Outline: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Name: The Outlaw Josey Wales
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Chief Dan George
Outline: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

Name: Stagecoach
Credit: Dir: John Ford With: John Wayne, Claire Trevor, Andy Devine
Outline: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

Name: Tombstone
Genre: Action | Biography | Drama | History | Romance | Western
Credit: Dir: George P. Cosmatos With: Kurt Russell, Val Kilmer, Sam Elliott
Outline: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Name: The Magnificent Seven
Credit: Dir: John Sturges With: Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson
Outline: An oppressed Mexican peasant village assembles seven gunfighters to help defend their homes.

Name: Blazing Saddles
Credit: Dir: Mel Brooks With: Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder, Slim Pickens
Outline: To ruin a western town, a corrupt political boss appoints a black sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

Name: 3:10 to Yuma
Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: Russell Crowe, Christian Bale, Ben Foster
Outline: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Name: Dead Man
Credit: Dir: Jim Jarmusch With: Johnny Depp, Gary Farmer, Crispin Glover
Outline: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange North American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

Name: Shane
Credit: Dir: George Stevens With: Alan Ladd, Jean Arthur, Van Heflin
Outline: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.

Name: True Grit
Credit: Dir: Ethan Coen, Joel Coen With: Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Hailee Steinfeld
Outline: A tough U.S. Marshal helps a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer.

Name: Little Big Man
Credit: Dir: Arthur Penn With: Dustin Hoffman, Faye Dunaway, Chief Dan George
Outline: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Indians and fighting with General Custer.

Name: High Plains Drifter
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Verna Bloom, Marianna Hill
Outline: A gunfighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

Name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
Credit: Dir: Andrew Dominik With: Brad Pitt, Casey Affleck, Sam Shepard
Outline: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

Name: Legends of the Fall
Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins, Aidan Quinn
Outline: Epic tale of three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of 1900s USA and how their lives are affected by nature, history, war, love and betrayal.

Name: Open Range
Credit: Dir: Kevin Costner With: Kevin Costner, Robert Duvall, Diego Luna
Outline: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

Name: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada
Credit: Dir: Tommy Lee Jones With: Tommy Lee Jones, Barry Pepper, Dwight Yoakam
Outline: Ranch hand Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.

Name: The Proposition
Credit: Dir: John Hillcoat With: Ray Winstone, Guy Pearce, Emily Watson
Outline: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

Name: True Grit
Credit: Dir: Henry Hathaway With: John Wayne, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell
Outline: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian territory.

Name: Back to the Future Part III
Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen
Outline: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

Name: The Good, the Bad, the Weird
Credit: Dir: Jee-woon Kim With: Kang-ho Song, Byung-hun Lee, Woo-sung Jung
Outline: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

Name: Pale Rider
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Michael Moriarty, Carrie Snodgress
Outline: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

Name: Rango
Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher, Timothy Olyphant
Outline: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

Name: Silverado
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Kasdan With: Kevin Kline, Scott Glenn, Kevin Costner
Outline: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Name: Westworld
Credit: Dir: Michael Crichton With: Yul Brynner, Richard Benjamin, James Brolin
Outline: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

Name: Bone Tomahawk
Credit: Dir: S. Craig Zahler With: Kurt Russell, Patrick Wilson, Matthew Fox
Outline: Four men set out in the Wild West to rescue a group of captives from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

Name: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Credit: Dir: Kelly Asbury, Lorna Cook With: Matt Damon, James Cromwell, Daniel Studi
Outline: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training. Yet throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

Name: Maverick
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Jodie Foster, James Garner
Outline: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

Name: Slow West
Credit: Dir: John Maclean With: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Michael Fassbender, Ben Mendelsohn
Outline: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

Name: Young Guns
Credit: Dir: Christopher Cain With: Emilio Estevez, Kiefer Sutherland, Lou Diamond Phillips
Outline: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

Name: Appaloosa
Credit: Dir: Ed Harris With: Ed Harris, Viggo Mortensen, RenÃ©e Zellweger
Outline: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.

Name: The Mask of Zorro
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Romance | Thriller | Western
Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Antonio Banderas, Anthony Hopkins, Catherine Zeta-Jones
Outline: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.

Name: Hidalgo
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Viggo Mortensen, Omar Sharif, Zuleikha Robinson
Outline: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

Name: Wyatt Earp
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Kasdan With: Kevin Costner, Dennis Quaid, Gene Hackman
Outline: Wyatt Earp is a movie about a man and his family. The movie shows us the good times and the bad times of one of the West's most famous individuals.

Name: Shanghai Noon
Credit: Dir: Tom Dey With: Jackie Chan, Owen Wilson, Lucy Liu
Outline: A Chinese man who travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

Name: The Horse Whisperer
Credit: Dir: Robert Redford With: Robert Redford, Kristin Scott Thomas, Sam Neill
Outline: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

Name: Far and Away
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Thomas Gibson
Outline: A young man leaves Ireland with his landlord's daughter after some trouble with her father, and they...

Name: The Missing
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tommy Lee Jones, Cate Blanchett, Evan Rachel Wood
Outline: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

Name: The Lone Ranger
Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Johnny Depp, Armie Hammer, William Fichtner
Outline: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.

Name: ¡Three Amigos!
Credit: Dir: John Landis With: Steve Martin, Chevy Chase, Martin Short
Outline: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

Name: The Quick and the Dead
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman, Russell Crowe
Outline: Lady avenger returns to western town owned by a ruthless gunslinger hosting an elimination tournament.

Name: A Million Ways to Die in the West
Credit: Dir: Seth MacFarlane With: Seth MacFarlane, Charlize Theron, Liam Neeson
Outline: As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his new-found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival.

Name: Cowboys & Aliens
Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Daniel Craig, Harrison Ford, Olivia Wilde
Outline: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

Name: The Legend of Zorro
Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Antonio Banderas, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Rufus Sewell
Outline: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) -- and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) -- to take action.

Name: Bandidas
Credit: Dir: Joachim RÃ¸nning, Espen Sandberg With: PenÃ©lope Cruz, Salma Hayek, Steve Zahn
Outline: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

Name: Wild Wild West
Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Will Smith, Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh
Outline: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth-century inventor-villain.

Name: Jonah Hex
Credit: Dir: Jimmy Hayward With: Josh Brolin, Megan Fox, John Malkovich
Outline: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.
